_header: You that have read the contents of thy book
_description: Conclusion to Earl Rivers’ translation of Dictes of Philosophers — three quatrains and couplets

Lam265.First Lines:
You that haue redd the cotentes of this Bookefrom ende to ende with
                    dylygence and payne…
Lam265.Last Lines:
…Concyder thys and labour to excedethe paynymes lyfe by
                    ffaythe and vertuous dede
Lam265.Note: Written in an early sixteenth-century hand.
Lam265.Attributed Author:
The monogram ‘NER’ (or possibly ‘TER’) appears
                    below the verse.
Lam265.Editions:
Bühler,  Kurt. 
             “The Verses in Lambeth Manuscript 265.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         72 (1957): 3-6: 5-6.
